txt.en: 'Welcome to the Methel-stage firework show! A new show will begin shortly.'
'The fireworks show will begin in one minute. Speak to me if you'd like to participate!'
'The show is starting in 10 seconds! Anyone not participating should have a seat in the audience!'
'Oh, fantastic! I can't wait for the next show!'
'Well done, friends! That was a show that shan't soon be forgotten!'
'But...I don't want to work. I just want to dance!'
'Was that it? That wasn't much of a performance.'
